title: How To Attract Your Ideal Customers Using Storytelling With Chris Laub
itunes:title: How To Attract Your Ideal Customers Using Storytelling With Chris Laub
description: Chris Laub runs a done for you agency that helps six-figure coaches enroll more clients while working less hours. In this interview he shares how you can structure your stories in a way that attracts your ideal clients.
content:encoded: Chris Laub runs a done for you agency that helps six-figure coaches enroll more clients while working less hours. In this interview he shares how you can structure your stories in a way that attracts your ideal clients.
itunes:subtitle: Selling With Storytelling
itunes:author: Zachary Babcock
